SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = BOARD.USER_ID WHERE DEL_YN IS NULL AND CATEGORY = #{category}
AND UPPER(U.USER_NIC) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{val}),'%')
AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{val},'%')
AND (UPPER(U.USER_NIC) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{val}),'%') OR TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{val},'%'))

SELECT NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, RECOMMEND, VIEW_CNT, CATEGORY, CASE WHEN U.IS_DEL = 'Y' THEN '탈퇴한 사용자' ELSE U.USER_NIC END AS AUTHOR, DATE_FORMAT(APPLY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS APPLY_FORMAT_DATE FROM BOARD JOIN USER U ON U.USER_ID = BOARD.USER_ID WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (TITLE, CONTENTS, APPLY_DATE, USER_ID, DEL_YN, CATEGORY) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, NOW(), #{id}, #{temp}, #{category})
INSERT INTO COMMENT (USER_ID, APPLY_DATE, COMMENT, BOARD_NO, CATEGORY) VALUES (#{user}, NOW(), #{comment}, #{no}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), DEL_YN = #{temp} WHERE NO = #{no}
